item.title: Skill area
item.dc:creator: @roberini roberini
item.description:
@roberini wrote:

Hi everyone,

We(me and my friend) made a skill area, but all the things don’t work(except for 2)

I take the Mining ore as example.

Here is the make global object

	makeGlobalObject(2375, 3431, 2111, 0, 10);//purple ore

and here is the case

        case 2111:
            if (actionTimer == 0) {	
                addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14);
                addItem(995, 1000000);
                sendMessage("You Gain Some Mining, and get some Cash!!");	
                setAnimation(624);
                actionTimer = 15;
                updateRequired = true; 
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            }
            break;

Why doesn’t it work? The rest is nonetheless the same, but with different object id’s and messages and items you get.

Read full topic
